domain.interfaces
Interface FiredActionable

All Superinterfaces:
Actionable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Menu, Player, UserControlled
public interface FiredActionable
extends Actionable

This subinterface inherits the Actionable methods. The FiredActionable type represents a game entity wich will be able to process a FiredAction given a user event. This means that the FiredActionable instance should have a collection of FiredAction instances implemented.

Method Summary
 boolean hasActionFocus()
           
 void setActionFocus(boolean actionFocus)
          This method should be used to change the focusable state on the FiredActionable instance.
 
Methods inherited from interface domain.interfaces.Actionable
addAction, getActionableName, getActions, processAction
 

Method Detail

hasActionFocus

boolean hasActionFocus()
Returns:
true if this FiredActionable instance is currently responding to user events. false otherwise.

setActionFocus

void setActionFocus(boolean actionFocus)
This method should be used to change the focusable state on the FiredActionable instance.

Parameters:
actionFocus - a boolean value indicating if the FiredActionable is currently listening at the user events. true if it's listening, or false if not.
